akas: The Secrets of Life World-wide (English title) (alternative transliteration)
akas from release info: The Secrets of Life World-wide (English title) (alternative transliteration)

1.title: Hayat Sirlari
1.plot: From the outside, the couple Mustafa and Inci Kuzgun, who seem to be an ordinary family with three children, have a big secret that no one knows about. The secret that Mustafa and Inci were able to keep from everyone for 35 years, even their children, is about to be exposed. A monstrous man from their past will be a great danger to the Kuzgun family. Seher, the eldest daughter of the Kuzgun family, is a successful lawyer. During her university years she had lived a great love with a successful film director Burak, but suddenly she decides to left and to lose her ...

2.title: Geri Getir
2.plot: Burak is asking for the account of the great lover, Seher, which he still can not forget, and Seher is trying to stay away from Burak even though she feels painful because she feels that her big secret is coming out. Mustafa is trapped in the corner with the possibility of a frightening past coming out. Hakan, who received acting advice from Sirin's channel, finds his father's identity years later. He is preparing to go out against his father and his family and to poison his life. Kemal's secret profession came out, all of Mustafa's plans about his son have fallen ...

3.title: Nerdesin Sen
3.plot: Aysen is aiming to get rid of Seher forever with the threat of throwing Kuzguns from the building. Seher finds Burak in Adana where she goes to find her daughter. Hakan learns that his father is Mustafa Kuzgun who has left him, and he makes a plan for revenge. Hakan does not know what kind of trouble he gets in. There is something that the one-eyed wants from the Kuzguns.

4.title: Saklayamazsin
4.plot: Inci understands that there is no longer escape when she faces the one-eyed. Will she do what he wants to protect Mustafa and her family? The mystery for Seher and Burak's break-up is revealed. Will Aysen hide from Burak what she do? Seher tired from carrying the burden alone explains everything Kemal. Will brother and sister be able to solve Seher's problems? While Hakan is approaching his father and the Kuzgun family step by step, the time one-eyed gives is almost over! Unexpected developments leave the Kuzgun family in trouble.

5.title: Çok özlüyorum
5.plot: Kemal's intervention was nothing but angering Ismet. Ismet, who has made two misplays of the money he wants to silence, gives two days to Inci and Kemal and disappears. When Inci and Kemal thought how to find the money, they were unaware that Mustafa witnessed everything. While Kemal was trying to find the money Ismet wanted, Mustafa also had a secret plan. Burak is now confident that will not be able to lose Seher again after they met and is making various plans to regain her heart. Seher's guard against Burak is also about to fall. However, she is trying to cope ...

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Hakan stands at Mustafa Kuzgun's door and says, "You are my father." When Mustafa confronts Hakan, Kemal tells Inci that he couldn't gave the money to Ismet because he was shot. When Inci saw Mustafa's weapon, she thought that Ismet was shot by her husband. However Mustafa followed his son and the visor of Ismet was fascinating. Inci, who is suspicious of her husband's movements, follows Zafer. Kemal takes the money he received from Banu and returns it to her father. Banu, who is falling more in love every day, can not opening to Kemal. In the meantime, Kemal was very...

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Hakan's arrival falls like a bomb to the house of the Kuzgun family! Mustafa either confesses the truth, or he will betray Hakan as his son. Seher, Kemal and Sirin will leave the house with great anger, thinking that their father betrayed his mother. Burak will host the fugitives. This event brings Seher and Burak closer together. The one-eyed, Ismet, has no intention of being comfortable, he has a new plan to cut money from the family. With a great development, Seher is one step closer to her missing child.

8.title: Kolay Degil
8.plot: Hakan is moving to the Kuzgun family house. Although Mustafa and Inci have no choice but to accept this situation, the children are fighting Hakan. When Seher finds her daughter, the people she sees near Zeyno will be very familiar. Seher is in great shock. Has Zeyno been with these people for so many years?

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Seher finds Zeyno! While Burak was trying to overcome the shock of Zeyno's being his own daughter, Mustafa was on a journey that was not known. Mustafa has a mysterious guardian. Seher is determined to take account from her girl's kidnappers. Will Burak be able to forgive Seher for hiding the truth?

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: The Kuzgun family is shaken by the news for the grandchild. As Seher is looking for ways to be reunited with Zeyno, she is also determined to make those responsible pay. With the devastation that Burak now feels, he is also now more certain that things will not be like before with Seher. With the evidence in Meryem's possession, Aysen could be in prison for many years. Selma arrives in Kuzgun home for a show down. Someone totally unexpected from Mustafa's past arrives to the rescue.

11.title: Finale
11.plot: The Kuzgun family welcome their grand-daughter with open arms and warm hugs. Years later Mustafa is face to face with the friend that saved his life. The two old friends spend quality time reminiscing about the past. Hakan is face to face with his biological father, will he learn the truth? Aysen does everything she can to rid herself of the trouble she is dealing with. For some reason Seher cannot get her daughter to accept her. Will Seher's daughter finally accept her and love her? What kind of future awaits Seher and Burak? Will these two lovers be able to pass ...

imdb.plot outline: The Secrets of Life centers the heartwarming, intense and a bit thrilling story of Kuzgun family whose happiness was wrecked when the secrets of family members comes out one after another. While the audience is captured by the heart breaking and passionate love story of Burak and Seher, the series is a warm loving exploration of Kuzgun family's life within the walls of their home and in their restaurant. This intense story will definitely make a mark on the hearts and the minds of the audience who will quickly identify and sympathize with the main characters.
